## ðŸ“º YouTube Monitor Setup
This workflow tracks specific YouTube channels and notifies Discord of new videos from the last 24h.

### 1. Add Channels
Open the node **"Define Channel IDs"** (Step 1). You need to paste the `Channel ID` (Not the @handle) of the creators.

**â“ How to find a Channel ID:**
Since YouTube uses handles (e.g., @n8n), the ID is hidden. 
* **Option A:** Use a free online "YouTube Channel ID Finder".
* **Option B:** Go to the channel page > Right Click > View Page Source > Search for `channel_id`.

### 2. Configure Discord
Open the **"Discord Notification"** node and add your Webhook URL.

## ðŸŸ¢ Demo Configuration (Spanish AI Channels)
